description: The SQLCMD utility allows users to connect to, send Transact-SQL batches from, and output rowset information from SQL Server instances. The bcp utility bulk copies data between an instance of Microsoft SQL Server and a data file in a user-specified format. The bcp utility can be used to import large numbers of new rows into SQL Server tables or to export data out of tables into data files.
displayName: Microsoft® Command Line Utilities for SQL Server®
summary: Command-Line Utilities for Microsoft SQL Server.
author: Microsoft
